org.jasig.portlet.courses.grades.mvc.portlet

Class CourseGradesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.portlet.courses.grades.mvc.portlet.CourseGradesController

  • public class CourseGradesController
extends java.lang.Object
    Renders the grade and GPA information for a selected semester.

    1.0

      • displayGradeSummary

        public ModelAndView displayGradeSummary(PortletRequest request,
                               java.lang.String termCode)
        Returns both the Model and View inside of a single object which will be displayed to the user. The semester selected by the user from a list of all qualifying semesters is used to retrieve grades from, and the overall GPA and credit totals are calculated.
        Parameters:
        request - A PortletRequest used to retrieve information on how to further render the portlet
        termCode - A String which holds the selected term
        Returns:
        A ModelAndView that holds the model and view to be used with this controller
